widget.name: WidgetName
widget.description: The progress bar widget lets you display a percentage as a bar.

property.caption: Progress attribute
property.description: The attribute that contains the progress percentage.

property.caption: Bootstrap Style
property.description: Value of attribute should be: info, warning, danger, success. Alternatively use the 'Class bar' property set styling

property.caption: Description
property.description: The text to display in the bar after the percentage value.

property.caption: Width
property.description: The width in pixels of the widget. If 0 it will be 100%

property.caption: Colour switch value
property.description: The percentage at which the text gets a contract colour (class) to black to white.

property.caption: Type
property.description: Render the type of progress bar: default, striped or animated

property.caption: Click MicroFlow
property.description: If set the MF will be called on click on the Progress Bar

property.caption: Progress bar style
property.description: The styling and color of the progress bar using Bootstrap classes.
